basics.name: Tiffany Young
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.B.A. in Management Information Systems at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall 2023.

highlights: Provide excellent customer service while in a fast-paced and high stress environment.
Balance many responsibilities including answering phone calls, packing orders, serving tables, and hosting while maintaining a professional disposition.
Work closely with others as a team to create a unique and memorable experience.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
